text: læa brrdā p̄hū̂ thī̀mā h̄lạngcāk phwk k̄heā doy phwk k̄heā kl̀āw ẁā k̄ĥā tæ̀ phracêā k̄hxng reā thrng pord xp̣hạy h̄ı̂ kæ̀ reā læa phī̀n̂xng k̄hxng reā p̄hū̂ sụ̀ng dị̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā k̀xn h̄n̂ā reā læa k̄hx phraxngkh̒ xỳā dị̂ h̄ı̂ mī kār kheīydkhæ̂n keid k̄hụ̂n nı h̄ạwcı k̄hxng reā t̀x brrdā p̄hū̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā k̄ĥā tæ̀ phracêā k̄hxng reā thæ̂cring phraxngkh̒ th̀ān pĕn p̄hū̂thrng xĕndū p̄hū̂thrng mettā s̄emx
